short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to change video playback speed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for changing the playback speed of videos such as youtube using keyboard shortcuts.

Features
- Change the playback speed in 0.1x increments.

Usage
- a key - slow down the playback speed 
- d key - speed up playback speed 
- s key - reset playback speed

Source code : https://github.com/zusizusi/playback-speed-chrome-extension
